import { FC, useEffect, useState } from "react" import { Button, Card, Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap" import { useHistory, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { Items } from "../../../types/models" import {itemsApi} from "../../../api/moviesDB" import {useItems} from "../../../hooks/useItems" type ParamsType= { id: string } const DetailCard: FC = () => { const {getItemFB } = itemsApi const {getDetail} =useItems() const [item, setItem] = useState() const { id } = useParams() const {goBack} = useHistory() useEffect(() => { getDetail(id) }, []) return (

Detalle: {item?.title}

  • Fecha de estreno: {item?.release_date}
  • Descripción: {item?.overview}
  • Idioma original: {item?.original_language}
) } export { DetailCard }
